name: Card Flip Castle
description:
Summary:

Almost your standard crawl through ruined ramparts full of slimes and skeletons, but this time, use your short-term memory to chain items and actions together - find defense/restoration items, use them when strategically best, then unleash a string of powerful magic and critical attacks!

Oh, and please let me know if something breaks or doesn't work.

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys - Navigate
  • Z - Confirm
